text: Hanzel und Gretyl Für Immer is a remix album by the Industrial metal band Hanzel und Gretyl and companion album to 2012's Born to Be Heiled. It was released on Metropolis Records, on October 8, 2013. All songs on this album were written by Hanzel und Gretyl. All remixes by KyzrWolf. == Track listing == == Personnel == * Kaizer Von Loopy – vocals, guitar, programming * Vas Kallas – lead vocals, bass * KyzrWolf \- remixes == External links == *Official Hanzel Und Gretyl Website *Official MySpace page *Metropolis Records Category:Hanzel und Gretyl albums Category:2013 albums Category:German- language albums Category:Metropolis Records albums
title: Hanzel und Gretyl Für Immer
